docs.title: API Reference
docs.description: This document serves as a high-level table of contents for the Stagehand backend API. The API is organized by resource, with each major resource having its own detailed documentation file.

docs.title: API Reference: Authentication
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the authentication-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Companies
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the company-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Findings
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the security finding-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Hierarchy
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the hierarchy-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: SCM Integrations
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the Source Code Management (SCM) integration API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Invitations
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the invitation-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Memberships
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the membership-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: OIDC Configuration
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the OIDC configuration-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Organizations
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the organization-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Projects (Applications)
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the project-related API endpoints. "Projects" are the core entities in the Stagehand developer catalog and are often referred to as "Applications" in the UI and business logic.

docs.title: API Reference: Relationships
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the project relationship-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Security Tools
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the security tool integration-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Teams
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the team-related API endpoints.

docs.title: API Reference: Technologies
docs.description: This document provides a detailed breakdown of the technology-related API endpoints.

docs.title: Backend Architecture & Conventions
docs.description: This document provides a detailed guide to the structure, conventions, and patterns used in the packages/api service. It is intended for developers working on the backend to ensure consistency and maintainability.

docs.title: Frontend Architecture & Conventions
docs.description: This document provides a detailed guide to the structure, conventions, and patterns used in the packages/web service. It is intended for developers working on the frontend to ensure consistency and maintainability.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Application Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components used for displaying the details of a single application (referred to as a "Project" in the backend and hierarchy).

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Architecture Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components used for rendering the project dependency graph.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Findings Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components used for displaying security findings.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Integration Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components used for managing integrations with external tools like GitHub (SCM) and Snyk (Security Tools).

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Settings Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components used within the SettingsPage.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Sidebar Components
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the components that make up the main navigation sidebar.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Custom Hooks
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the custom React hooks used throughout the application.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Lib Utilities
docs.description: This document provides a breakdown of the shared utility functions and constants defined in the lib directory.

docs.title: Frontend Documentation: Pages
docs.description: This document provides an in-depth breakdown of the main "page" components, detailing their display function and the specific state they consume.

docs.title: Stagehand Developer Documentation
docs.description: Welcome to the comprehensive developer documentation for the Stagehand platform. This documentation covers everything from API references to architectural decisions, frontend components, and integration guides.
